Class SVG.TextBBox

      com.sencha.gxt.chart.client.draw.engine.SVG.TextBBox
Enclosing class:
SVG
public static final class SVG.TextBBox
extends JavaScriptObject

JavaScriptObject representing bounding box results of an SVG text element.
